bannerCon.title: Youth Red Cross
bannerCon.bannerCon: Training minds, empowering skills, and launching successful careers

blocks.value: The Youth Red Cross (YRC) of the Karpagam Academy of Higher Education is the part of Indian Red Cross Society (Tamil Nadu Branch). It provides training programmes for first aid, Voluntaries of Blood Donation, Organ transplantation, AIDS awareness programme and Cancer awareness programme.
Dr. A. Dharmaraj, YRC Co-Ordinator, Dr. R. Saroja Devi, YRC Programme-Officer, Mr. B. Jagadeeshwaran Student Co-Ordinator. Students can approach YRC Programme Officer for enrolment and training.
